text: Shou ci jingdian de renmen [you jing ren] a! Zai wo gaihuan mianmu [ru ba renmen xianzai mianbu shang de yan bi kou gai zai nao hou] bing shi qi zhuanxiang houmian, huo zhengru wo qianze bu shou anxiri zhe yiyang qianze tamen zhiqian, nimen dang quexin wo suo jiang shi [gei mu sheng] de jingdian [“gulanjing”], ta neng zhengshi nimen yi you de jingdian. An la de mingling shi yao zhixing de.
